mapper.insert: INSERT covi_approval4j.jwf_legacy ( Parameters, Mode, State, EventTime, ErrorMessage, ErrorStackTrace, ErrorClass, DeleteTime ) VALUES ( #{parameters}, #{mode}, #{state}, NOW(3), #{errorMessage}, #{errorStackTrace}, #{errorClass}, #{deleteTime} );

INSERT covi_approval4j.jwf_legacy ( Parameters, Mode, State, EventTime, ErrorMessage, ErrorStackTrace, ErrorClass, DeleteTime, FormInstID, ProcessID, FormPrefix, DocNumber, ApproverId, ApvMode, FormInfoExt, ApprovalContext ) VALUES ( #{parameters}, #{mode}, #{state}, #{eventTime}, #{errorMessage}, #{errorStackTrace}, #{errorClass}, #{deleteTime}, #{FormInstID}, #{ProcessID}, #{FormPrefix}, #{DocNumber}, #{ApproverId}, #{ApvMode}, #{FormInfoExt}, #{ApprovalContext} );
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM covi_approval4j.jwf_legacy a LEFT OUTER JOIN covi_approval4j.jwf_forminstance b ON a.FormInstID = b.FormInstID LEFT OUTER JOIN covi_approval4j.jwf_forms c ON b.FormID = c.FormID WHERE 1=1 AND DeleteTime IS NULL AND a.Mode = #{searchMode}
AND a.State = #{searchState}
AND EventTime BETWEEN #{startDate} AND TIMESTAMPADD(Day,1,#{endDate})
AND
b.Subject b.InitiatorName c.FormName a.DocNumber a.FormInstID
like CONCAT('%', #{searchWord},'%')
AND ( a.FormInstID = #{icoSearch} OR b.Subject LIKE CONCAT('%',#{icoSearch},'%') OR b.InitiatorName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{icoSearch},'%') OR c.FormName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{icoSearch},'%') OR a.DocNumber LIKE CONCAT('%',#{icoSearch},'%') )
AND EXISTS ( select 'x' from covi_approval4j.jwf_forminstance fi where fi.forminstid = a.forminstid and fi.entcode = #{EntCode} )

select LegacyHistoryID ,ApvMode ,IfType ,LegacyInfo ,Parameters ,ActionValue ,LegacyKey ,State ,ErrorStackTrace ,RawResponse ,ResultCode ,ResultMessage ,FormPrefix ,FormInstID ,ProcessID ,UserCode ,Subject ,EventStartTime ,EventEndTime ,ElapsedTime ,LegacyConfigID ,RegistDate from covi_approval4j.jwf_legacy_if_history where LegacyHistoryID = #{LegacyHistoryID}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM covi_approval4j.jwf_legacy_if_history ih LEFT OUTER join covi_approval4j.jwf_legacy_if_config ic on ih.LegacyConfigID = ic.LegacyConfigID JOIN covi_approval4j.jwf_forminstance b ON ih.FormInstID = b.FormInstID
AND b.EntCode = #{EntCode}
LEFT OUTER JOIN covi_approval4j.jwf_forms c ON b.FormID = c.FormID LEFT OUTER JOIN covi_approval4j.jwf_process p ON p.ProcessID = b.ProcessID LEFT OUTER join covi_approval4j.jwf_processdescription pd on pd.ProcessDescriptionID = p.ProcessDescriptionID WHERE 1=1 AND ih.DeleteDate IS NULL
AND ih.State = #{searchState}
AND ih.RegistDate BETWEEN #{startDate} AND TIMESTAMPADD(Day,1,#{endDate})
AND
ih.ApvMode ih.IfType ic.ProgramName c.FormName ih.Subject b.InitiatorName b.DocNo ih.forminstid
like CONCAT('%', #{searchWord},'%')
AND ( ic.ProgramName = #{icoSearch} OR c.FormName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{icoSearch},'%') OR ih.Subject LIKE CONCAT('%',#{icoSearch},'%') OR b.InitiatorName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{icoSearch},'%') OR b.DocNo LIKE CONCAT('%',#{icoSearch},'%') OR ih.forminstid LIKE CONCAT('%',#{icoSearch},'%') )
